body_html:
@ebrevdo I am facing a similar issue , how do I migrate my code to v1.1 from 0.9 ,

        #cell = tf.nn.rnn_cell.LSTMCell(self.num_input, self.num_input)
        cell = tf.contrib.rnn.BasicLSTMCell(self.num_input, self.num_input)
        #print(_X.shape)
        state = _istate
        for step in range(self.num_steps):
            outputs, state = tf.nn.rnn(cell, [_X[step]], state)
            #outputs, state = tf.contrib.rnn.BasicRNNCell(cell, _X[step], state)
            tf.get_variable_scope().reuse_variables()
        return outputs

but I am getting the following error :

    outputs, state = tf.nn.rnn(cell, [_X[step]], state)
AttributeError: 'module' object has no attribute 'rnn'
*** Error in `python': free(): invalid pointer: 0x0000000000e032f0 ***
Aborted (core dumped)

body:
@ebrevdo  I am facing a similar issue , how do I migrate my code to v1.1 from 0.9 , 
```
        #cell = tf.nn.rnn_cell.LSTMCell(self.num_input, self.num_input)
        cell = tf.contrib.rnn.BasicLSTMCell(self.num_input, self.num_input)
        #print(_X.shape)
        state = _istate
        for step in range(self.num_steps):
            outputs, state = tf.nn.rnn(cell, [_X[step]], state)
            #outputs, state = tf.contrib.rnn.BasicRNNCell(cell, _X[step], state)
            tf.get_variable_scope().reuse_variables()
        return outputs
```
but I am getting the following error : 
```
    outputs, state = tf.nn.rnn(cell, [_X[step]], state)
AttributeError: 'module' object has no attribute 'rnn'
*** Error in `python': free(): invalid pointer: 0x0000000000e032f0 ***
Aborted (core dumped)
```
